text: Phalachthia (), also Phalachthia in Phthiotis (Φαλαχθία Φθιώτιδος), was a town of Oetaea in ancient Thessaly. Its location is unknown. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Oetaea Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Phalachthia
